title: EZ Backup Ultimate 6.15-serial incl(works with Windows 7)
description:
EZ Backup Ultimate is an application designed to ease the task of backing up your data from various common programs to a local drive, network folder, CD/DVD and even to a remote FTP server! The scheduling feature can provide a completely automated backup solution and 128 bit encryption is available to secure the backup archive.
